job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Backend Developer, you will be instrumental in scaling, optimizing, and professionalizing our AI automation platform. You'll design and build high-performance, distributed backend systems that seamlessly integrate AI models into customer workflows. Working closely with machine learning engineers and DevOps specialists, you'll develop cloud-native services, streamline CI/CD pipelines, and enhance system security and reliability.

   This role offers an exciting opportunity to shape the future of AI-powered customer service in a fast-paced, venture-backed startup.

   Responsibilities:
     * Develop and optimize scalable backend services, cloud-based infrastructure, and REST APIs.
     * Ensure performance and reliability by refining architecture, monitoring systems, and implementing security best practices.
     * Streamline DevOps workflows by improving CI/CD pipelines and optimizing deployments.
     * Collaborate on the technical roadmap, working with the CTO and engineering team to drive innovation.
job_details.full_text:
Python Developer - AI (Agents) Startup -

As a Backend Developer, you will be instrumental in scaling, optimizing, and professionalizing our AI automation platform. You'll design and build high-performance, distributed backend systems that seamlessly integrate AI models into customer workflows. Working closely with machine learning engineers and DevOps specialists, you'll develop cloud-native services, streamline CI/CD pipelines, and enhance system security and reliability.

   This role offers an exciting opportunity to shape the future of AI-powered customer service in a fast-paced, venture-backed startup.

   Responsibilities:
     * Develop and optimize scalable backend services, cloud-based infrastructure, and REST APIs.
     * Ensure performance and reliability by refining architecture, monitoring systems, and implementing security best practices.
     * Streamline DevOps workflows by improving CI/CD pipelines and optimizing deployments.
     * Collaborate on the technical roadmap, working with the CTO and engineering team to drive innovation.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and scaling backend systems that integrate AI models into customer workflows, developing cloud-native services, and streamlining CI/CD pipelines. It mentions working closely with ML engineers and DevOps specialists, and the context of a startup focused on AI automation and AI-powered customer service strongly aligns with the responsibilities and focus of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in developing and deploying AI-driven applications.

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions 'Develop and optimize scalable backend services, cloud-based infrastructure, and REST APIs', which are core software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop and optimize scalable backend services, cloud-based infrastructure, and REST APIs

job_tasks.justification: Ensuring 'performance and reliability by refining architecture, monitoring systems, and implementing security best practices' are key aspects of robust software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Ensure performance and reliability by refining architecture, monitoring systems, and implementing security best practices

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Streamline DevOps workflows by improving CI/CD pipelines and optimizing deployments' directly relates to MLOps practices.
job_tasks.phrase: Streamline DevOps workflows by improving CI/CD pipelines and optimizing deployments

job_tasks.justification: Collaborating on the 'technical roadmap, working with the CTO and engineering team to drive innovation' indicates an understanding of business goals and strategic technical planning.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate on the technical roadmap, working with the CTO and engineering team to drive innovation

job_tasks.justification: The role involves integrating 'AI models into customer workflows' and working closely with 'machine learning engineers', implying direct interaction with and deployment of models, even if not directly building them from scratch.
job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly integrate AI models into customer workflows

soft_skills.phrase: Working closely with machine learning engineers and DevOps specialists
working with the CTO and engineering team
scaling, optimizing, and professionalizing our AI automation platform
